doc:
Squire Bancroft https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Squire_Bancroft 0 Sir Squire Bancroft (14 May 1841 – 19 April 1926), born Squire White Butterfield, was an English actor-manager. He and his wife Effie Bancroft are considered to have instigated a new form of drama known as 'drawing-room comedy' or 'cup and saucer drama', owing to the realism of their stage sets. Sir_Squire_Bancroft ( 14_May_1841 – 19_April_1926 ) , born Squire_White_Butterfield , was an_English_actor-manager . He and his_wife_Effie_Bancroft are_considered_to_have_instigated a_new_form of drama known as ' drawing-room_comedy_'_or_'_cup_and_saucer_drama_' , owing to the_realism of their_stage_sets .
